name: fs
label: File System (Standard)
description: The most standard access to a filesystem located on the server.

param.name: PATH
param.label: Path
param.description: Real path to the root folder on the server

param.name: CREATE
param.label: Create
param.description: Create folder if it does not exists

param.name: CHMOD_VALUE
param.label: File Creation Mask
param.description: Optionnaly apply a chmod operation. Value must be numeric, like 0777, 0644, etc.

param.name: PURGE_AFTER
param.label: Purge Days
param.description: Option to purge documents after a given number of days. This require a manual set up of a CRON task. Leave to 0 if you don't wan't to use this feature.

global_param.name: PROBE_REAL_SIZE
global_param.label: Real Size Probing
global_param.description: Use system command line to get the filesize instead of php built-in function (fixes the 2Go limitation)

global_param.name: USE_XSENDFILE
global_param.label: X-SendFile Active
global_param.description: Delegates all download operations to the webserver using the X-SendFile header. Warning, this is an external module to install for Apache. Module is active by default in Lighttpd. Warning, you have to manually add the folders where files will be downloaded in the module configuration (XSendFilePath directive)
